headline: Afghan Forces Kill a Girl, Then Her Grieving Father
abstract: The girl was shot dead in southern Afghanistan, and when her father took her body to a military base to ask for justice, he was killed.
lead_paragraph: KABUL, Afghanistan â€” The Afghan government said on Saturday that it was investigating the fatal shootings by Afghan soldiers of a girl and her father in Kandahar Province, amid complaints by residents that the security forces have for years been accused of extrajudicial killings and other abuses.
